title: Button, late 18th century
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Three circular medallions in the style of Wedgwood Jasperware; open flower with twelve crinkled petals; white on blue.

On card 4

tombstone.epitaph:
Button, late 18th century.
late 18th century. Stoneware. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-23-a/c.
